text: ¡Tré! is the eleventh studio album by American punk rock band, Green Day. ¡Tré! was released on December 7, 2012. It is the third and last album in the ¡Uno!, ¡Dos!, ¡Tré! trilogy. The album featured the single "X-Kid". The album debuted at #13 on the US Billboard 200 chart and the first-week sales were 58,000 copies in the United States. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2012 albums Category:Green Day albums
title: ¡Tré!
